title: turn off the 2nd SIM (card) temporarily
content:
I'm using 4a (4G), I want to turn off the 2nd SIM (card) temporarily, I've follow Help Center's instruction: 

Settings > Network & internet > Select the 2nd SIM card 
>>>>> but cannot find where is the "Use SIM", cannot tap. 

I want to keep the 2nd SIM card inside the mobile, but no need any connection both internet / phone call, but I want the card stay inside so I can connect it easily when I need it. This setting can easily made on HTC phone since few years ago, I think Pixel 4a can also do it easily, is it?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
